sentences.sContent: Churchill’s statue stands outside the parliament building.
sentences.sCn: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.sContent: A bronze statue was erected in his honour.
sentences.sCn: 人们立了一座铜像纪念他。

remMethod.val: stat(站) + ue → 总是站立的东西 → 塑像

trans.tranOther: an image of a person or animal that is made in solid material such as stone or metal and is usually large
